snippet: James Shields threw a two-hitter, but B. J. Upton’s contribution on offense caused Shields to name Upton “player of the game.”
abstract: MLB Roundup;Tampa Bay Rays center fielder B J Upton crushes three home runs in team's 6-0 victory over the Texas Rangers; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: James Shields threw a two-hitter, but B. J. Upton’s contribution on offense caused Shields to name Upton “player of the game.”

headline.seo: B. J. Upton Homers 3 Times as Rays Beat Rangers
headline.main: 3 Homers by Upton Keep Rays Near Yanks
headline.print_headline: 3 Homers By Upton Keep Rays Near Yanks
